Data course overview

A practical and rigorous course on data, from formats and models to governance, architecture, and real-world use across AI, cybersecurity, and digital systems.

datamodellinggovernance1 min read

Course overview

This course builds through four levels: foundations, intermediate, advanced, and a summary with games. It keeps the same CPD tracking and section toggles as the other tracks.
